Scenes > The Ashikaga Palace

– Click image to view.

The Ashikaga Palace

(足利館) (Ashikaga yakata)

Performance: May 1971: The Gion Festival

Production: May 1971

Narrators:

Takemoto Tsukomadayū (竹本津駒大夫)

Takemoto Datejidayū (see also Takemoto Datetayū V) (竹本伊達路大夫)

Shamisen (Musicians):

Nozawa Katsunosuke (野澤勝之輔)

Nozawa Kichibei IX (野澤吉兵衛 (九))
